languages.text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% damage. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through ability this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.

This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: 此角色穿过敌人，抵达敌人对面的格子，进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，但造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。受到攻击的敌人陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 - 目标敌人无法再次成为利刃切割{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的目标。 - 不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此角色穿过敌人，抵达敌人对面的格子，进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}，但造成的伤害降低50%。受到攻击的敌人陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 - 目标敌人无法再次成为利刃切割能力的目标。 - 不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Персонаж бросается на противника, перемещаясь сквозь его позицию на клетку с противоположной стороны, и совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, уменьшенный на 50%. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. -Этот противник не может снова стать целью {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} Стремительное рассечение в этом раунде. -Не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж бросается на противника, перемещаясь сквозь его позицию на клетку с противоположной стороны, и совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. -Этот противник не может снова стать целью способности Стремительное рассечение в этом раунде. -Не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g}.

Персонаж бросается на противника, перемещаясь сквозь его позицию на клетку с противоположной стороны, и совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. -Этот противник не может снова стать целью способности Стремительное рассечение в этом раунде. -Не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g}.

languages.text: このキャラクターはダッシュで敵を駆け抜けて敵の反対側のセルに移動し、−50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行う。効果を受けた敵は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態になる。 -ターゲットとなった敵は、このラウンドに再び切り通しの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットになることはできない。 -{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。
languages.original_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターはダッシュで敵を駆け抜けて敵の反対側のセルに移動し、−50％のダメージを与える{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を行う。効果を受けた敵は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態になる。 -ターゲットとなった敵は、このラウンドで再び一閃通しのアビリティのターゲットになることはできない。 -{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。

languages.text: El personaje acomete a un enemigo y llega hasta la casilla del lado opuesto, efectuando un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige −50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. El enemigo queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. -El enemigo objetivo no puede ser objetivo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Atravesar otra vez este asalto. -No provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El personaje acomete a un enemigo y llega hasta la casilla del lado opuesto, efectuando un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige -50 % de daño. El enemigo queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. -El enemigo objetivo no puede ser objetivo de la capacidad Atravesar otra vez este asalto. -No provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: Dieser Charakter sprintet durch einen Feind hindurch auf die Zelle auf der gegenüberliegenden Seite und führt einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} aus, der −50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht. Der betroffene Feind wird 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}. -Der anvisierte Feind kann in dieser Runde nicht erneut Ziel der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Hindurchschneiden werden. -Provoziert keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g}.
languages.original_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Charakter sprintet durch einen Feind hindurch auf die Zelle auf der gegenüberliegenden Seite und führt einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} aus, der -50 % Schaden verursacht. Der betroffene Feind wird 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}. -Der anvisierte Feind kann diese Runde nicht erneut Ziel der Fähigkeit Hindurchschneiden werden. -Provoziert keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g}.

languages.text: Ce personnage s'élance au travers d'un ennemi pour rejoindre la case située de l'autre côté et lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige −50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. L'ennemi subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -L'ennemi ciblé ne peut plus être la cible de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Percée au cours du round en cours. -Ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ce personnage s'élance au travers d'un ennemi pour rejoindre la case située de l'autre côté de celui-ci et lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige -50 % de dégâts. L'ennemi subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. - L'ennemi ciblé ne peut plus être la cible de la capacité Percée au cours du round en cours. - Ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: Bu karakter, bir düşmanı yarıp geçerek düşmanın karşı tarafındaki hücreye doğru atılır ve bu esnada da %50 azaltılmış {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Etkilenen düşman, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}. -Hedefteki düşman, bu rauntta bir kez daha Biçip Geç {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} hedefi olamaz. -Herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetiklemez.
languages.original_text: This character dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected enemy becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. -The targeted enemy cannot become a target of the Slice Through {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} this round again. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.
